Source.Name: perl-Event-RPC
Source.Summary: Event::RPC - Event based transparent Client/Server RPC framework
Source.Description: Event::RPC supports you in developing Event based networking client/server applications with transparent object/method access from the client to the server. Network communication is optionally encrypted using IO::Socket::SSL. Several event loop managers are supported due to an extensible API. Currently Event and Glib are implemented.
